definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke

sentences.english: Europe and Russia accounted for bulk of tobacco exports in the current year.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲和俄罗斯占本年度烟草出口的大部分。

sentences.english: The village now attracts businesses interested in shipping, steel, tobacco and textiles.
sentences.chinese: 现在华西村开始开发船运，钢铁，烟草和纺织业。

sentences.english: Induced accumulation of the acidic pathogenesis-related proteins ( PRs ) in tobacco leaves by ningnanmycin was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了宁南霉素对烟草酸性病程相关蛋白的诱导表达。

sentences.english: Transgenic tobacco young seedings are obtained in taking root culture medium .
sentences.chinese: 转基因烟草在生根培养基中获得了烟草小苗。

sentences.english: Transgenic tobacco young seedings are obtained in taking root culture medium .
sentences.chinese: 转基因烟草在生根培养基中获得了烟草小苗。

sentences.english: Breslau's own research also has suggested tobacco may somehow contribute to depression.
sentences.chinese: 布雷斯劳的研究也表明烟草可能成为消沉的原因。

sentences.english: On Wednesday, the tobacconists went to on strike against the a new anti-smoking law.
sentences.chinese: 星期三，烟草制造商继续抗议政府的新反吸烟法。

sentences.english: Almost half of children regularly breathe air polluted by tobacco smoke.
sentences.chinese: 近半数儿童经常呼吸遭受烟草烟雾污染的空气。

sentences.english: But high taxes do not always mean expensive cigarettes.
sentences.chinese: 高额烟草税不总能让烟价高不可攀。

sentences.english: That's because fewer women than men smoke or chew tobacco.
sentences.chinese: 这是因为吸烟或咀嚼烟草的女性少于男性。

sentences.english: The renaturation of polyphenol oxidase from Tobacco denatured in 6 0 mol/L guanidine hydrochloride(GdnHCl) was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了盐酸胍变性烟草多酚氧化酶后的复性。

sentences.english: Anti-tobacco commercials have been around on television for decades.
sentences.chinese: 反烟草广告在电视中已经出现了几十年。

sentences.english: He set up shop as a retail tobacconist in the High Street.
sentences.chinese: 他在哈艾大街开业做烟草零售商。

sentences.english: Comparative National Institute of Health expenditure on tobacco compared with other health problems.
sentences.chinese: 比较国家烟草研究所与支出相比其他健康问题的健康。

sentences.english: PCR and APX activity detection showed that transgenic plants were obtained.
sentences.chinese: 检测证明目的基因已经整合到烟草基因组中。

sentences.english: Then, they infected the tobacco plants with the gene-carrying virus.
sentences.chinese: 然后，他们将携带着基因的病毒注射进烟草植物。

definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke
